software.name: orangehrm
software.description: OrangeHRM Open Source is a free HR management system that offers a wealth of modules to suit the needs of your business. This widely-used system is feature-rich, intuitive and provides an essential HR management platform along with free documentation and access to a broad community of users.
software.installation_report_template:
Goto _Engines_Builder(http_protocol)://_Engines_Builder(fqdn)/
Follow the wizard
At Step2 Database Configuration
Database to Use: Select Existing Empty Database from the pull down menu
Database Host Name: _Engines_Environment(dbhost)
Database Host Port  Leaveas 3306
Database Name: _Engines_Environment(dbname)
OrangeHRM Database Username: _Engines_Environment(dbuser)
OrangeHRM Database User Password: _Engines_Environment(dbpasswd)


Follow the rest of the wizard to complete the installation
